Most issues will fall into one of two categories:

### Suggesting an addition/edit
Do you have an idea for something to add? We're happy to take suggestions.

Please include:

- a description of what you think we're missing and should add
- what category it might go under, or a new category if one should exist
- any useful/relevant links
  - videos, guides, posts, etc with details/info on what you're suggesting

### Reporting a problem
Is something out of date? Is a link broken? Are we providing some inaccurate information?

Please include:

- what's wrong or needs fixing
- which pages are affected
- any useful/relevant links
